generated_body: The article titled "Nor'easter to grind at US East Coast this weekend" is likely to provide a detailed overview of the upcoming weather conditions associated with the nor'easter affecting the East Coast of the United States. Readers can expect information on the storm's projected path, expected snowfall or rainfall amounts, and potential impacts on travel and daily activities. Additionally, the article may outline any precautions residents should take and include forecasts from meteorologists. Overall, it will inform readers about what to anticipate as the storm approaches, helping them prepare accordingly.
